name: Kpakowa
description:
It's a normal day in Krakosha's oldest nuclear station when suddenly the core damages! you find yourself in the dark with your teamates and you must save your city(and probably all europe) from the certain dead repairing the damaged core...are you ready for such job?

4 players coop

GGJ 2020 game:

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/krakosha-7
